    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

Top note is Mandarin Orange; middle note is Petitgrain; base note is Patchouli. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a             <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Penhaligon&#039;s Portraits Collection: The Impudent Cousin Matthew and The Ingnue Cousin Flora</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Sandra Raievi Petrovi</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            03/04/19 07:21
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">16</span>
</div>

Shame considering it's so beautiful. Simply not worth the money at this price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="2320108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=2320108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271019" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jambu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1474763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jambu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763">jambu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 04:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright, clean, neroli scent.<br />
When I first smelt this it reminded me of Maison Alhambra's Porto Neroli, which is a clone of Tom Ford Neroli Portofino (which I have not personally smelt)<br />
Compared to Porto Neroli, I think these two are about 70% similar. Penhaligon's has the edge in terms of performance by a little bit, but imo it's not worth the price. I would get Porto Neroli over this, just because it's a much better value.<br />
<br />
Scent 4/5<br />
Price 2/5<br />
Performance 2.5/5<br />
<br />
Total 2.8/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="2271019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=2271019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082313" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2082313" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iblamesaud"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044119"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2044119.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iblamesaud" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Opium-Eau-de-Parfum-2009-7399.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7399.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opium Eau de Parfum 2009"title="Opium Eau de Parfum 2009"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2082313ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2082313" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044119">iblamesaud</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 16:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>its as simple as the ingredients, the opening smells like orange then all you gonna smell is aloe vera, or like an orange garden nothing special but its simple, fresh, mass appealing fragrance  and suitable for hot weather in the summer. me personally I wore this fragrance in marbella-spain in the summer and I really enjoyed it its very similar to tom ford neroli portofino but I prefer this because the performance is slightly better and for the price of a 50ml tom ford neroli portofino you can get this 100ml bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="2082313"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=2082313#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995321" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Raucousdaucus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/289370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Raucousdaucus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/289370">Raucousdaucus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 14:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont know why neroli isnt listed. This is a neroli cologne. Had high hopes for this as I love original vetiver and other soapy colognes, but this has a kind of powdery soap at the base and way too much neroli. Smells like Aqua di Parma tried to remake Mugler Cologne with neroli.<br />
<br />
Edit: I spent some time with this in the cooler weather and it really shines. I live in a tropical climate so maybe summer to me is hotter than what others mean. This is a relatively fresh, soapy neroli but its not a summer freshie. This shines in cooler weather and probably would do well in cold weather. In the heat it gets powdery and suffocating. I dont like many nerolis, but in cooler temps this smells neat and clean and the neroli isnt overpowering or cloying. Very nice when applied in its native British weather. Yes, there are comparisons to Mugler cologne because its a soapy cologne, but its also very different.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1995321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1995321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent1880000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880000" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SRusackas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1790526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SRusackas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53875.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"title="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880000ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880000" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1790526">SRusackas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-16">07/16/23 08:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts off bright, and exciting with the orange. This is the scent of an orange when you are slicing it. A lot of the rind and zest, and a touch of the meat of the fruit. Its very fresh, not bitter or sour. After about 20 minutes it calms down to a light soapy orange stem if you crushed the leaves. I think this is what they wanted Irish spring to smell like if it could have had quality oils. It seems to stand up well if you are outside, and compliments spring and summer weather the best. Its complex but not complicated. Simple, but it has a signature which I find I am greatly enjoying. Its a smell that accompanies me, it doesnt announce me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1880000"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1880000#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1845945" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1845945" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1845945ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1845945" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-31">05/31/23 11:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yea, basically the Tom Ford Neroli Portofino DNA. More so than Mugler Cologne DNA or Creed Original Vetiver. That's pretty good but the question would be which expression of this DNA do you want. Cousin Matthew has value within the Penhaligon Portraits line, so there's that. There are more notes than those listed. In addition to petigrain there is neroli/orange blossom, etc.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1845945"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1845945#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1795191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1795191" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1795191ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1795191" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-28">03/28/23 22:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A refreshing cirtus masculine fragrance This such a nice clean orange scent that keeps on the skin because of that patchouli. I think it's quite pleasant for a perfume after getting out of the shower because you will smell crispy and fresh. I for some reason get the image of a faithful man who respects and is close to his family. Super respectable kind and uplifting. Sillage is more close to skin, and longevity is great. <br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
Saggitarius Virgo Leo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1795191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1795191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1787898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you do you'll get multi-purpose household cleaner and mild depression. That's what happened to me (blind buy) but on the day I was meant to upload to ebay I had no meetings scheduled or humans to offend so thought I'd give it a shot. <br />
<br />
So glad I did because off skin this is a feast of Petitgrain and Patchouli and not a hint of Dettol/Lysol anywhere. <br />
<br />
Phew!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1617451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1617451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1613979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1539147" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wjaechoi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1060689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="wjaechoi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Superman-Eau-Fraiche-43712.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43712.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Superman Eau Fraiche "title="Le Male Superman Eau Fraiche "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1539147ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1539147" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1060689">wjaechoi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-08">04/08/22 00:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very pleasant scent. Woody, clean, crisp. I like that it's not spicy, and it definitely benefits from sitting on your skin. Lasts a good few hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1539147"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1539147#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1514993" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1514993" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="StaticCentreHalf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1430325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="StaticCentreHalf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1514993ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1514993" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1430325">StaticCentreHalf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-02">03/02/22 09:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>DO NOT spray this in the air or on a strip and then judge. If you do then you'll fall in to the same trap @Bilko72 did. Instead, wear it... let it develop on your skin... and then you end up with a delicious, green, soapy fragrance that is absolutely perfect for British (i.e. mild, rather than warm) summers - daytime or evening.<br />
<br />
Glory to Ukraine!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1514993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1514993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1503657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1503657" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kaylovely"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329847"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329847.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kaylovely" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alexandre-J/Zafeer-Oud-Vanille-22361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.22361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zafeer Oud Vanille"title="Zafeer Oud Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1503657ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1503657" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329847">Kaylovely</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-13">02/13/22 11:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a white thick soap. Say you rubbed the soap on yourself like hot wax. This is so beautiful, very similar to La Panthere EDT. This is way more soapy and rich, amazing! The musk actually helps for once in perfumery. Dial, dove on steroids with an organic label and quality. Irish Springs: ivory. I'm testing this Dolce Riso and Seminalis. They are all great. Seminalis is a mix between the two; it reminds me of a baccarat strawberry milkshake. I will choose Panthere edt instead. This is more similar to Oriana without the fruit. Laundry Musk. Beautiful, not sure it's long lasting compared to la panthere edt anyway... EDT??</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1503657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1503657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1487771" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gotoperfume"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1440980"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="gotoperfume" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1487771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1487771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1440980">gotoperfume</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-21">01/21/22 05:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells nice and fresh, but it reminds me of baby perfume. Don't get me wrong, I could wear this in the summer or to the gym. But believe me, go and smell baby perfume/scents and this smells EXACTLY the same. It really shocked me how similar it was to something that you could find in a supermarket for 2-3. <br />
<br />
For the price of 204, I definitely wouldn't pay retail for this.. luckily it was part of the prize draws on Penhaligons website not too long ago (probably going to discontinue it soon).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1472123" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mayamaya80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mayamaya80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1472123ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1472123" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402168">mayamaya80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-28">12/28/21 20:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice inoffensive perfume. Perfect for the summer though you might need to top up several times a day because this does not last on the skin at all. You need to overspray. It does smell similar to other scents/colognes that you can get a lot cheaper but I find this not as harsh nor alcoholy in the opening. This is smooth and refreshing. I'm just glad I got this for free after playing a game at the Penhaligons website. I will not pay full price for this. But it really is a lovely scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1472123"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1472123#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1443524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1439472" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jsweet361"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312620"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jsweet361" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Crazy-For-Oud-57880.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57880.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Crazy For Oud"title="Crazy For Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1439472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1439472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312620">jsweet361</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-03">11/03/21 11:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Cologne Podcast gave a good review of this fragrance that I agree with. A green, soapy scent that could be substituted for something in the lesser price tier. It is good but not necessarily worth the price tag. Neroli Portofino is a good option if you like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1439472"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1439472#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1426265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1426265" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frozen_music"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399896"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1399896.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frozen_music" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4564.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Castile"title="Castile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1426265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1426265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399896">frozen_music</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-11">10/11/21 08:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has a very strong fragrance as you first put it on and as it settles it very much smells like soap which isn't what I personally like in a perfume. Not worth the price tag in my opinion. There are much nicer Penhaligons fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1426265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1426265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1424288" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1424288" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1424288ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1424288" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-07">10/07/21 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SOAP<br />
<br />
An enjoyable fresh, soapy, green fragrance.  In the same world as Original Vetiver by Creed.  <br />
<br />
Perfect for a spring or summer day - or all year round to wear to work. <br />
<br />
As far as Penhaligon's other fresh fragrances, I prefer Opus 1870 or Quercus to 'Matthew'.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1424288"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1424288#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1418373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1418373" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PerfumeKick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376129"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1376129.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PerfumeKick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Baiser-de-Russie-48679.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48679.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baiser de Russie"title="Baiser de Russie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1418373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1418373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376129">PerfumeKick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-28">09/28/21 03:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This does not smell like mugler or tom ford or banana republic. Neither it smells like bortnikoff oud cologne which is practically orange candy in a bottle. It seems that all people voting for similarities are speculating like crazy about this fragrance.<br />
<br />
What it does smell like is Xerjoff Nero70 Campomarzio edition. It's been bugging me for quite a while after I got my sample that scent is awfully familiar and today when wearing Matthew it fell into place. Extremely similar, don't get yourself fooled bu the notes what you read. It's not patchouli heavy. What is in matthew are woodsy musks and something vanillic to make it more creamy in the base. Never the less outstanding release. I can imagine people not enjoying this unique composition, I know I do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1418373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1418373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1399629" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1399629" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tstricklin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1129752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1129752.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tstricklin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ermenegildo-Zegna/Mediterranean-Neroli-34030.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34030.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mediterranean Neroli"title="Mediterranean Neroli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1399629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1399629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1129752">tstricklin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-27">08/27/21 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Excellent offering from this house.<br />
<br />
Presentation is top notch.<br />
<br />
Does NOT smell like Mugler Cologne.<br />
<br />
Not offensive at all and I really enjoy wearing this.<br />
<br />
However...<br />
<br />
This is simply not worth the price.. $225 for 75ml..<br />
<br />
I go 8 to 12 sprays per wearing, performance is weak on me, so 75ml wont last long..<br />
<br />
This fragrance should be sub $150.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1399629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1399629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1373196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1373196" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miguel Vella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miguel Vella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1373196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1373196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360379">Miguel Vella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-09">07/09/21 10:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After purchasing various Winter scents from Penhaligon's it was just right to invest in some Summer fragrances. Cousin Matthew has a delightful smell, citrusy and one can even identify the petitgrain and the patchouli.<br />
<br />
My only complain to what is a wonderful smell is the weak longevity and sillage. At times it barely leaves any scent after a couple of hours.<br />
<br />
Due to the fact above I don't think I would be spending my money on this again. A shame as when the smell is still there it is wonderful for a Summer day or night.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1373196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1373196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1361563" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1361563" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1361563ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1361563" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-17">06/17/21 12:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Inoffensive summer scent. I got a free bottle in the portraits game (which is great value) but I would be pretty upset if I had paid 204 for this. As a pleasant summer scent (unisex in my opinion I'm female) I prefer Matthew to his sister Flora but it's not a complex scent. Wouldn't spend 204 on it but as I got it for free with a 30ml bottle of Artemisia (which I love) I'm fairly happy. For a pettigrain orange scent I prefer Nero by Lush and for Penhaligon's citrus I prefer creamy Empressa or Orange Blossom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1361563"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1361563#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1356554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356554" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J350"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J350" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356554ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356554" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660">J350</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-08">06/08/21 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I hated it the first time I sampled this. I found it too overpowering and offensive. However, the dry down became more subtle and gentle and pleasant. It is citrus but it also does have some aromatic and woody notes to it which I think is a very unique combination. The sillage and longevity is also good. This is the perfect summer scent. <br />
<br />
My overall rating: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1356554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1356554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1274538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1274538" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cheessey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cheessey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1274538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1274538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293732">Cheessey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-11">01/11/21 20:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The citrus on this is nice. The scent is very straightforward. The citrus makes it a great summer scent that is not offensive.  Like many, it does not last long, but that makes me enjoy it more. It is nice to have the flexibility to change scents once the night comes since summer nights have a very different feel from the day. <br />
<br />
I also find that it helps prevent bug bites which is nice to have a two in one, but it is a bit of pricey for a good smelling bottle of OFF.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1274538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1274538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1262043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1262043" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alixiialice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263568"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263568.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alixiialice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1262043ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1262043" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263568">alixiialice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-17">12/17/20 00:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Citrusy opening with petitgrain green bitterness. It then goes into a neroli note with a soft fig-like powderiness. Orange sweetness mixed with inky bitter mossy notes is the central facet of Cousin Matthew. Dry down is dry woody patchouli and oakmoss, giving off a chypre-like quality. <br />
<br />
I enjoyed every bit of this fragrance. This doesn't strike me as a juvenile or simple-minded citrus scent. This is skillful blend of natural-smelling, complementary layers of notes, resulting in a green citrus fragrance that's invigorating yet at the same time embodying depth, restraint, and dignity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1262043"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1262043#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1180676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1180676" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="waruna gomis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/179205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.179205.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="waruna gomis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coreterno/Punk-Motel-57081.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57081.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Punk Motel"title="Punk Motel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1180676ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1180676" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/179205">waruna gomis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-26">05/26/20 20:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What you can expect...<br />
I love citrus perfumes because it's always summer in Sri Lanka (in-between the monsoons).<br />
<br />
About this one ...<br />
A slightly bright green tree<br />
A citrus note<br />
A little mint ... Just like the pyramid.<br />
There may me a slight waft of amber that helps to keep the fragrance anchored.<br />
<br />
Nothing spectacular, boring to the point and quite timid in its atmosphere.<br />
Quite a fleeting perfume and not worth the penny.<br />
<br />
3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1180676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1180676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1175484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1175484" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ts4r"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143921"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1143921.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ts4r" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Escentric-05-58970.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58970.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escentric 05"title="Escentric 05"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1175484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1175484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143921">ts4r</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-14">05/14/20 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply, this is one of the brightest, most natural perfumes.<br />
<br />
I find this has Neroli, too.<br />
<br />
10/10 -1 --&gt; 9/10 <br />
<br />
Price is a little high.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1175484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1175484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1169326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1169326" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maffew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231998"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1231998.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maffew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elixir-Attar/Ghaliya-Rosarie-70696.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70696.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ghaliya Rosarie"title="Ghaliya Rosarie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1169326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1169326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); Their loss is totally my gain! Uplifting, refreshing, clean, you catch my drift. Very pleasant indeed!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1169326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1169326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1133539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1107108">1universe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-12">01/12/20 00:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As of January 2020, it sells on fragrancebuy.ca for CAD$189 instead of CAD$365. (Tax &amp; shipping are separate.) <br />
I have a feeling this one lasts a bit longer than Muglers Cologne because this one is EDP.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1133539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1133539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1120321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1120321" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xabaras"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.24302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xabaras" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53875.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"title="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1120321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1120321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24302">xabaras</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-30">11/30/19 08:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I was a child there was a mosquito repellant called "Autan" which smelled exactly like the opening of The impudent cousin Matthew. I liked that smell. I still do. And it was lovely to find it again in this fragrance, this citrusy powerful blast only hits you for 5 minutes or so. Then it becomes round and perfectly balanced. Probably the petitgrain. It is like a Cologne that is about to fade but you still perceive if you really pay attention. I really love it. I would happily bathe in this. The drydown is different from any other fragrance I have ever tried. It makes you feel at ease, clean, ready for anything life would throw at you. Shame for the price though. I will never afford a full bottle of this. And my 5ml sample will not last long. <br />
It is gorgeous. Anyone should try this fragrance at least once. <br />
Mugler's Cologne is lovely too, but it could never be a substitute.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1120321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1120321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1117250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145607">waskotransportation</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-02">05/02/19 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I found this at beautyhabit.com and am currently waiting for payday to buy full bottle!  I LOVE Mugler cologne but it doesn't last on my skin for some reason.  This should have better longevity given the high price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1056422"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1056422#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1045270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1045270" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrHonest"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/993365"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.993365.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrHonest" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Dreamer-The-Original-Edition-642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dreamer The Original Edition"title="Dreamer The Original Edition"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1045270ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1045270" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/993365">MrHonest</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-27">03/27/19 11:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A brilliantly bright and soapy petitgrain that reminds me a great deal of Mugler cologne - not surprising since they're both Morillas creations.  <br />
<br />
You'll recognize the DNA immediately - neroli-like citrus and slightly grassy greenness in the opening that hints at vetiver as it progresses on skin.  The transition into the petitgrain mid is a tad jarring, but it smoothes out rather nicely after a few minutes. Overall, EXTREMELY well blended, with excelllent performance for a freshie and a powderiness in the drydown that gives it a nice, classy unisex feel.<br />
<br />
It literally takes me to the edge of a slow-rolling brook where a freshly mown lawn gives way to reeds concealing a trout or two.  Absolutely nothing unique here, but a fantastic spring scent nonetheless and probably my second favourite from the entire portraits line!<br />
<br />
Scent - 8.5/10<br />
Longevity - 8/10<br />
Projection - 7/10<br />
Overall - 8/10 - White shirt worthy.<br />
<br />
UPDATE: No wonder I love it so much!  It smells like Froot Loops!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53875"comment_id="1045270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html?ccid=1045270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>

    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
